"If only I had a chair that could transport me back in time, I could have started working on this assignment earlier and had ample time to finish it."
"I could have saved myself a lot of stress if I had known the chair would be such a pain to move. Maybe I should have looked for a more ergonomic one."
"I wish I had a chair that could adjust to my height and posture, so I could it properly and avoid any back pain."
"I regret not taking a break to stretch my legs while working on this assignment. If I had a chair with a footrest, I could have done so more easily."
"If I had a chair with a built-in desk, I could have worked more efficiently and saved time by not having to move papers around."
